Realtime Detection.help_text: Say Start detection to start detecing the objects around you by using the camera.

Find.help_text: Say Find followed by the name of the object you would like to find.

Navigation.help_text: Say navigate to followed by destination, then Google Maps will open.

Status Check.help_text: Say status to check the system information.

Time.help_text: Say time or time now to get the current time.

Shutdown.help_text: Say shutdown or exit to turn off the assistant.
